latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

dsDescriptionValue.value: The objective of the study is to monitor the changes in rice farming in the major rice producing area of the Philippines - the Central Luzon region, which is called as the "rice bowl of the Philippines."

keywordValue.value: Basic household and farm characteristics and input and output data in rice production such as; yield, fertilizer, insecticide, weedicide and other pesticides, and labor use.  Data  are also available on adoption of modern rice technologies,  prices of input and output  and farm wage rates.

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 95; Subject: Wet  Type: Season  Notes: 2011; Subject: Dry  Type: Season  Notes: 2012;

value: Bulacan, Nueva Ecija, Pampanga, Tarlac, Pangasinan and La union
